org.apache.camel

Interface EndpointAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchConsumer, Consumer, PollingConsumer, Producer, Route, RouteContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractApiConsumer, AbstractApiProducer, BeanProducer, BindingProducer, CollectionProducer, ControlBusProducer, DataSetConsumer, DefaultAsyncProducer, DefaultConsumer, DefaultProducer, DefaultRoute, DefaultRouteContext, DefaultScheduledPollConsumer, DeferProducer, DirectBlockingProducer, DirectConsumer, DirectProducer, DirectVmBlockingProducer, DirectVmConsumer, DirectVmProducer, EventDrivenConsumerRoute, EventDrivenPollingConsumer, FileConsumer, GenericFileConsumer, GenericFileProducer, LanguageProducer, LoadBalancerConsumer, LogProducer, PollingConsumerSupport, ProcessorPollingConsumer, RestApiProducer, ScheduledBatchPollingConsumer, ScheduledPollConsumer, SchedulerConsumer, SedaConsumer, SedaPollingConsumer, SedaProducer, SendProcessor, StubConsumer, SynchronousDelegateProducer, TimerConsumer, UnitOfWorkProducer, ValidatorProducer, VmConsumer

    public interface EndpointAware
    An interface to represent an object such as a Processor that uses an Endpoint

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Endpoint getEndpoint()
      Gets the endpoint associated with an object.

    • Method Detail

      • getEndpoint

        Endpoint getEndpoint()
        Gets the endpoint associated with an object. It's the endpoint for sending to for components like Producer or for consuming from for components like Consumer or Route
        Returns:
        the endpoint
